TestCase.TestCaseTitle: The Producer service description (WSDL) shall comply withthe minimum specified for compliance with WS-I BasicProfile 1.1.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The purpose is to verify that the service description (WSDL) of the producer conforms to the desired subset of the WSDL and SOAP specifications.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: After acquiring the producer's service description (WSDL)examine it for conformance with the desirable aspects of theWS-I Basic Profile 1.1.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: The producer's service description (WSDL) and related included and imported artefacts.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is completed when the producer's service description(WSDL) is verified to conform to the desirable aspects of theWS-I Basic Profile 1.1.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: Verification that the producer's service description (WSDL)conforms to the desirable aspects of the WS-I Basic Profile1.1.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) to determine the binding style specified for each binding relating to an MIP4 PortType.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The binding style is specified as 'document'.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) to determine the binding transport specified for each binding relating to an MIP4 PortType.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The binding transport is specified as 'http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http'.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) to determine the operation style specified for each binding related to an MIP4 PortType.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The operation style is specified as 'document'. Note: If the attribute is not specified directly, it defaults to the value specified in the soap:binding element. If the soap:binding element does not specify a style, it is assumed to be "document".

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) for to determine the input and output body style specified for each binging related to an MIP4 PortType.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The body style is specified as 'literal'.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) to determine the specified port names associated with the defined service.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The port names within the defined service are unique.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Examine the producer's service description (WSDL) to determine the port address location associated with each port.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The port address location will be specified and contain a valid URL.
